# BNNS.ShuffleType.spaceToDepthNCHW

**Case**

The pixel shuffle for the NCHW format, equivalent to space-to-depth in Column Row Depth (CRD) mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case spaceToDepthNCHW
```

## Related Documentation

- **BNNSShuffleTypePixelUnshuffleNCHW**: The pixel unshuffle for the NCHW (batch, channels, height, width) format, equivalent to space-to-depth in Column Row Depth (CRD) mode.

## Enumeration Cases

- **BNNS.ShuffleType.depthToSpaceNCHW**: The pixel shuffle for the NCHW format, equivalent to depth-to-space in Column Row Depth (CRD) mode.
